articles.title: FM Spokesman Flays U.S. Trumpeting about "Religious Freedom"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Flays U.S. Trumpeting about "Religious Freedom"
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Institute for American Studies at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on January 11 as regards the fact that the U.S. Department of State re-listed the DPRK as a "state of special concern for religious freedom".
					 On December 22, 2017, Lex Tillerson, secretary of State of the U.S., designated 10 countries including the DPRK, China, Iran and Saudi Arabia as so-called "states of special concern for religious freedom" and following his designation, the U.S. Department of State issued its official statement on January 4 that it re-listed those countries as "the states of special concern for religious freedom".
					
					 The "religious freedom" much chanted like monk's prayers by the U.S. is nothing more than a means to seek internal disintegration and overthrow of systems in the countries that are not in its favor and hence the U.S. chanting of "religious freedom" is being subject to condemnation and rejection in many countries around the globe.
					
					 The U.S. is the world's worst state of religious oppression and discrimination that is indulged in acts of infringing upon the religious freedom and it even forbids citizens of some Islamic countries from their normal travels under the pretext of anti-terrorism. The U.S. has already lost any right to say this and that about religious freedom.
					
					 The DPRK is the most superior socialist state that legally guarantees the freedom of religions.
					
					 To us who have accomplished the great historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces with confidence in the final victory in the showdown with imperialism and the U.S., the stereotyped talk of "religious freedom" by the U.S. is nothing more than a scream of a loser.

articles.title: U.S. Denounced for Abusing Religion in Its Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Denounced for Abusing Religion in Its Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Council of Religionists issued a statement Thursday over the fact that the Trump group of the U.S. started a smear campaign against the DPRK under the pretext of "religious issue" from the outset of the new year.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. State Department in a statement of its spokesman on Jan. 4 re-listed the DPRK as a "state of special concerns for religious freedom" where "religious freedom" is seriously encroached upon.
					
					 This is the last-ditch efforts of those lost to senses, being taken aback by the DPRK's successful completion of its state nuclear force, and it is part of the vicious smear campaign to tarnish the dignity of the DPRK and its drastically enhanced strategic position over the religious issue.
					
					 The U.S. is a matchless monster state, the world's biggest rogue state devoid of any right and face to talk about religious freedom.
					
					 The religionists of the DPRK consider the U.S. to be a group of Satans and Asuras as it barbarously bombed and destroyed religious facilities in Korea like churches, Buddhist temples and cathedrals and mercilessly massacred a large number of religionists.
					
					 During the last Korean War, thousands of religious facilities that had existed in the northern half of Korea were leveled by the barbarous bombardment of the U.S. who often advocates "religious freedom" and hundreds of thousands of innocent believers were ruthlessly massacred by the American ogres.
					
					 The U.S. is keen on getting braced for a nuclear war against the DPRK while openly calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK and "extermination of the nation", thereby seriously threatening the sacred cradle of the religious life of the believers in the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is trying hard to insult the dignified DPRK and shake the faith of the believers in the DPRK while trumpeting about the "religious freedom". But it is nothing but an anachronistic wild dream.
					
					 The faith and will of the believers of the Republic who trust and follow the great leader, Heaven of Korea, as savior of the destiny remain unchanged and they are unbreakable.
					
					 The U.S. has to immediately stop the mean and vicious act of finding fault with the DPRK, being pursuant to the anachronistic hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The Korean Council of Religionists will strongly counter the U.S. ferocious tyranny and hostile policy toward the DPRK in solidarity with the religionists of different countries valuing love, peace and justice, in the future, too.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Korean Schoolchildren from Japan Feted
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Korean Schoolchildren from Japan Feted
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in Pyongyang for an art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan on Thursday under the care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. The troupe took part in the New Year celebration performance.
					 Present there on invitation was the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan headed by Jon Jin Song, principal of Kyusu Korean Middle and High School.
					
					 On hand were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Overseas Koreans' Affairs Administration, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol said in his speech that Marshal Kim Jong Un bestowed warm loving care on the members of the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan even though he was busy leading the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 He expressed belief that Korean schoolchildren in Japan would prepare themselves to be pillars of the patriotic cause of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) only following the Marshal and the competent patriotic talents equipped with knowledge, good moral character and good health.
					
					 Jon Jin Song thanked Marshal Kim Jong Un for having invited the Korean children in Japan to the New Year celebration performance and shown warm loving care for them with parental affection.
					
					 He said that Korean schoolchildren in Japan would prepare themselves to be the reliable successors to the movement of Koreans in Japan and the true pillars of the patriotic movement.
					
					 Schoolchildren in Pyongyang and members of the art troupe gave a joint performance at the reception.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Cuba Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Cuba Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Havana on Jan 5 hosted a reception to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were the commander of the Air and Anti-Aircraft Defense Forces of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba; figures from Cuban political party, government and bodies including the international department of the C.C., Communist Party of Cuba, Foreign Ministry, Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces and the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, and Lourdes Cervantes, secretary general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America.
					
					 Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy members were on hand.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on December 25 last year.
					 In the message the Russian party chairman extended his heartfelt greetings to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the New Year 2018.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 The DPRK's working people who got further united and stronger under the leadership of the WPK are greeting 2018 after seeing out one year amid the rigorous trials.
					
					 The world reactionaries led by the warlike U.S. and its vassal forces could not break the spirit of the Korean people and stop the road for the socialist development chosen by themselves.
					
					 I hope that the people of the DPRK would register greater successes on the road for building a socialist society and achieving lasting peace in the region and the earth.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Myongsasipri, Scenic Spot on East Coast of Korea
articles.content:
Myongsasipri, Scenic Spot on East Coast of Korea
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Four-kilometer-long sandy beach resort, called Myongsasipri, is one of scenic spots on the east coast of Korea.
					 It is located on the southeast of the Kalma peninsula in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province.
					
					 There is a hill with the height of 100 meters above the sea level in the northward end of Myongsasipri. 
					
					 Growing around the hill are pine trees, pine-nut trees and oak trees. There is goldenrain tree at the entrance of Myongsasipri. Sweet briers are growing on sandy beach.
					
					 Sweet briers blooming red on the sandy beach along the shore, green pines around it and waves of the East Sea add scenic beauty to Myongsasipri.
					
					 A rest home and modern high buildings built on the hill and the entrance of Myongsasipri add beauty to landscape.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year address that this year the service personnel and people should join efforts to complete the construction of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area in the shortest period of time.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Guarantees Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Guarantees Peace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The nuclear force of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is the powerful deterrent to the adventurous war gambles of the United States, disturber of global peace, and the treasured sword for safeguarding peace. Thanks to this, the DPRK is foiling the sinister attempts of the U.S. to stifle it by force and realize the wild ambition for world domination and firmly protecting peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the region despite the anti-DPRK aggression moves. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is the life and soul of the nation that can not be bartered for anything and the eternal foundation for rosy future of the country.
					
					 It is the mission of the nuclear force of the DPRK to ensure durable peace of the Korean Peninsula and the region and happiest life of the Korean people in peaceful environment.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is not a bargaining chip for political purpose and business.
					
					 The nature of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK with nukes still remains unchanged. This tells that the DPRK should continue to bolster up the nuclear force under the unfurled banner of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts.
					
					 With the powerful treasured sword for defending peace the DPRK has nothing to fear and always remains assured.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening up Way for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening up Way for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Defusing military tension and removing the danger of a war from the Korean Peninsula at present are an essential issue for achieving the national unity and reunification, says an article of Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 It would not be possible to remove the distrust and conflict between the north and the south nor would it be possible to cover the path to reunification as long as the military tension mounts, the article notes, calling for ending the extreme military tensions at an early date and opening up the way for independent reunification.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the consistent stand and will of the DPRK to foil the outsiders' aggression moves and safeguard the wellbeing of the fellow countrymen and defend the peace of the country. We will as ever strive hard to defend the peace on the Korean Peninsula and security of the nation.
					
					 Not hoping for the Korean nation getting reconciled and reunified, the U.S. is rendering the situation constantly tense on the Korean Peninsula in order to invade the DPRK and to realize the ambition for world domination.
					
					 The arms buildup and the large-scale joint military exercises with foreign forces aimed at threatening and invading the other partner are key factors straining the military tension between the north and the south and driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to unpredictable phase of danger.
					
					 The north and the south can certainly avert a war and defuse the tensions on the Korean Peninsula if they make up their mind to.
					
					 Neither aggression challenge nor obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces can ever check the advance of the Korean nation to write a new history of the national reunification by its concerted efforts.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Renegotiations on FTA with U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Renegotiations on FTA with U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo carried an editorial titled "Renegotiations on U.S.-south Korea 'Free Trade Agreement' Further Deepen Dependence of South's Economy" on Jan. 8.
					 The editorial noted that the U.S. demanded the customs withdrawal for the majority of fields including automobile and also the customs coordination for major items at the first renegotiations on "Free Trade Agreement" with south Korea held in Washington on Jan. 5.
					
					 Trump has called for renegotiating or finalizing the FTA with south Korea since he was a presidential candidate, it noted, adding the renegotiations are shackling ones furthering the dependence of the south Korean economy.
					
					 The economic crisis causing restructuring and the destitution of the people's living are attributable to dependence, the editorial stressed, emphasizing that a key solution to it lies in independence.

articles.title: Campaign for Arresting Lee Myung Bak Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaign for Arresting Lee Myung Bak Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of all strata reportedly conducted a campaign for arresting traitor Lee Myung Bak in various parts of Seoul on Jan. 6.
					 A candlelight action took place around the traitor's house under the sponsorship of the Headquarters of All-People Action to Punish Lee Myung Bak and "Commando for Seizing MB".
					
					 Attending it were civilians of various strata from across south Korea.
					
					 The participants held a demo from Hakdong Station to Lee's house before holding a candlelight rally.
					
					 Speakers at the rally said that there are many reasons for arresting Lee Myung Bak such as irregularities and corruption, crackdown upon media and import of American beef.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place another candlelight rally outside the Sejong Cultural Center under the sponsorship of the Citizens Alliance for Arresting MB.
					
					 The participants stressed that it is necessary to arrest Lee Myung Bak in order to clean up deep-rooted evils and reform the society completely.
					
					 At the same time, a one million-signature campaign started in demand of his detention.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Argentine Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Argentine Political Party
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Argentina on Jan. 3 posted the detailed gist of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address on its online bulletin "De Todas Partes".

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- There were DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Guinea, Turkey, Sweden and Mexico to mark the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display at the venues were photos showing the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing the reality of Juche Korea and handicrafts showing the creative skills of the Korean people.
					
					 The general secretary of the Democratic Rally of Africa-Democratic Party of Guinea said that the DPRK, which developed under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, is making signal achievements in all sectors under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Personages of Sweden said that the exhibition underway despite the situation more acute than ever before due to the U.S. and other hostile forces' nuclear threats and moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, was of great significance in having correct understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 They underlined the need to hold such exhibitions more frequently in the future, too, so as to further develop the bilateral cultural and friendly ties.

articles.title: Foreign Media Feature Articles on Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Foreign Media Feature Articles on Peerlessly Great Men
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- In the period between Dec. 18 and 22 last year, foreign media gave special write-ups to the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					 The Indian newspaper Ocean News Point carried an article illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un under the title of "Ideal State Leader".
					
					 The article praised him as the most ideal state leader with fine personality and qualifications in the present times, saying that the DPRK would emerge a more powerful and prosperous state under his leadership.
					
					 Articles praising the feats of Kim Jong Il were posted on the websites of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Daily Nauroz in an article titled "Advance of DPRK Which No Force Can Stop" introduced in detail the fact that the DPRK has consistently adhered to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force despite the vicious schemes of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces, adding that no force on the earth can prevent the DPRK from advancing under the line chosen by itself.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted an article titled "Invincible Power DPRK" on its website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nepalese, Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nepalese, Nigerian Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Nepalese and Nigerian organizations issued statements in support of the proposals for national reunification and foreign policy stand of the Workers' Party of Korea advanced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 The Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics in its statement on Jan. 4 said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is the highly important guideline illuminating the most correct way for durable peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK's prosperity. We extend full support to the just cause of the heroic Korean people for the country's independent reunification and final victory of revolution, it added.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association stated on Jan. 1:
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the miraculous successes registered by the Korean people last year and advanced just and realistic proposals for reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the nation under the uplifted banner of national independence.
					
					 He clarified that the WPK and the government of the DPRK will develop good-neighborly and friendly relations with all the countries that respect the DPRK's sovereignty and are friendly to it and make positive efforts to build a just and peaceful new world.
					
					 We support the proposals for national reunification and the DPRK's foreign policy stand clarified in his New Year Address.

articles.title: IAN de MINREX rechaza el falso reclamo de EE.UU. por la "libertad de religion"
articles.content:
IAN de MINREX rechaza el falso reclamo de EE.UU. por la "libertad de religion"
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano publico su decision de redefinir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "pais de preocupacion especial para la libertad de religion".
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos (IAN) del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 11 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					
					El 22 de diciembre del ano pasado, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Tillerson fijo a 10 paises, inclusive la RPDC, China, Iran y Arabia Saudita, como "paises de preocupacion especial para la libertad de religion". 
					
					Por consiguiente, el Departamento de Estado publico el dia 4 la decision de poner nuevamente ese estigma a los paises mencionados.
					
					El falso reclamo de EE.UU. por la "libertad de religion" causa el rechazo y repudio de todo el mundo, ya que persigue el objetivo de desestabilizar el interior de los paises, que no le agradan, y derrocar sus regimenes. 
					
					EE.UU. comete por doquier del orbe los actos de violacion de derechos humanos y libertad de creencia religiosa e impide hasta el viaje rutinario de los ciudadanos de algunos paises islamicos bajo el pretexto del "antiterrorismo". 
					
					Siendo peor pais represor y discriminador de la religion, EE.UU. perdio ya hace mucho tiempo la calificacion para hablar de la libertad de religion. 
					
					La RPDC es el Estado socialista mas ventajoso donde se garantiza por la ley la libertad de creencia religiosa.
					
					Nuestro pais, que ha cumplido la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y esta convencido de su victoria final en la confrontacion antiyanqui y antiimperialista, considera como alarido del derrotado el ya aburrido chisme de EE.UU. sobre la "libertad de religion".

articles.title: CRC condena la redefinicion de RPDC como "pais de preocupacion especial para la libertad de religion"
articles.content:
CRC condena la redefinicion de RPDC como "pais de preocupacion especial para la libertad de religion"
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea hizo publica el dia 11 una declaracion en relacion con que desde el principio del ano nuevo, los compinches de Trump lanzan una campana intrigante anti-RPDC cuestionando el "problema de religion".
					El dia 4, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. publico la declaracion de su portavoz en que volvio a definir a la RPDC como "pais de preocupacion especial para la libertad de religion".
					
					Este hecho significa un alarido de los que perdieron la razon ante el cumplimiento de la causa de la RPDC de completar sus fuerzas armadas nucleares, ironiza el portavoz del CRC y prosigue:
					
					Igualmente, forma parte del sucio complot para manchar la dignidad y la elevada posicion estrategica de la RPDC acusandola en el tema de religion.
					
					EE.UU. es pais diabolico y peor bribon del mundo que no tiene derecho ni cara para hablar de la libertad de religion.
					
					Para los religiosos de la RPDC, EE.UU. es el colectivo de satanicos que bombardeo y destruyo salvajemente las iglesias, templos y catedrales en el territorio coreano y mataron a sangre fria a numerosos religiosos.
					
					Durante la pasada guerra coreana, se destruyeron totalmente miles de instalaciones religiosas en la RPDC a causa del bombardeo de EE.UU., que reclama tanto la "libertad de religion", y resultaron muertos a manos de los canibales yanquis cientos de miles de religiosos inocentes.
					
					Hoy dia tambien, EE.UU. habla publicamente de la "destruccion total" de la RPDC y el "exterminio de la nacion coreana" e impulsa los preparativos de guerra nuclear anti-Norte amenazando gravemente el terreno de sagrada vida religiosa de los creyentes coreanos.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. trata de insultar a la digna RPDC y aflojar la conviccion de los creyentes insistiendo en la "libertad de religion", esto no pasa de ser una ilusion anacronica.
					
					Nunca se cambiaran la conviccion y voluntad de los religiosos de la RPDC que confian y siguen a su gran lider considerandolo como cielo de Corea y Redentor.
					
					EE.UU. debe cancelar de inmediato su sucio complot de acusar a la RPDC manteniendo su anacronica politica hostil a esta.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el CRC hara frente rotundo a las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. y a su politica hostil anticoreana solidarizandose con los religiosos de varios paises del mundo que aprecian el amor, la paz y la justicia.

articles.title: Se ofrece banquete para el grupo artistico de ninos escolares residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Se ofrece banquete para el grupo artistico de ninos escolares residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en esta capital un banquete preparado por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en honor del grupo artistico de los ninos escolares coreanos residentes en Japon que participo en la funcion por el Ano Nuevo 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					A la ocasion fue invitado el grupo encabezado por el director de la escuela secundaria coreana de Kyushu, Jon Jin Song.
					
					Participaron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Chol, el titular de la Direccion para Asuntos de los Compatriotas en Ultramar, Kim Jin Guk, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, Kim Yong Chol dijo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un dispenso grandes favores para los miembros del grupo artistico de los ninos escolares coreanos residentes en Japon, a pesar de que esta muy ocupado por construir al frente la construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Expreso la seguridad de que los escolares coreanos en Japon se prepararan como pilares de la causa patriotica de la Chongryon y personal competente que con ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena constitucion fisica, marcharan adelante por la ruta indicada por el Mariscal.
					
					Jon Jin Song expreso agradecimiento al Maximo Dirigente quien invito a los hijos de coreanos residentes en Japon a la escena de la funcion por el ano nuevo y les atendio con afecto paternal.
					
					Aseguro que los escolares coreanos en Japon creceran como continuadores fidedignos del movimiento de coreanos en Japon y pilares de la causa patriotica.
					
					En la ocasion, tuvo lugar la funcion conjunta de los ninos escolares capitalinos y los miembros del grupo.

articles.title: Embajada coreana en Cuba ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajada coreana en Cuba ofrece banquete 
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del aniversario 59 del Triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, se ofrecio el dia 5 un banquete en la embajada coreana en el pais caribeno. 
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion el comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de las FAR, las personalidades del partido, el gobierno y las entidades de Cuba como el Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista, el MINREX y el MINFAR y el Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea y el secretario general de la OSPAAAL. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el embajador Pak Chang Yul y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana.
